attributes.action: Intervene in the undemocratic way in which the implementation committee of Cornwall county Council is conducting the changeover to a single council for Cornwall.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The committee that is organising the change over to a single authority to govern the whole of Cornwall are acting in a very undemocratic way.The Cornish people are not being consulted over any decision and Cornwall's Culture,Heritage and history are being completely ignored.The whole thing is a mess with many of the councillors extremely unhappy as well of the local papers full of letters complaining which are totally ignored especially by the Chairman Mr David Whalley.
